name: Corporation Service Company
overview:
Corporation Service Company, Inc. offers deal and transaction services for corporations, law firms, financial institutions, and real estate companies. It offers registered agent and matter management services and solutions; litigation management systems; document management services, such as data inception, document archiving, and disaster recovery; electronic billing; and third-party integration services.

The company also provides compliance and governance solutions, such as entity management, Web-based compliance management services, annual report services, tax compliance and e-filing services, unclaimed property services, electronic boardroom services, and charitable filings; corporate transactional and uniform commercial code services and solutions for business entities, including corporations, limited liability companies, limited partnerships, limited liability partnerships, business trusts, and general partnerships; entity formations; and motor vehicle services, such as vehicle title, registration, collateral management, and record search services for various types of vehicles, including passenger cars, buses, trucks, watercraft, and manufactured homes.

In addition, it offers real property searching and filing services to legal professionals in law firms, corporations, and financial institutions; corporate identity protection services, such as domain name registration and online brand protection solutions; trademark screening, research, and watching services; digital brand monitoring services; Web-based patent management solutions; corporate trust services, escrow services, trusts and agencies, independent directors and managers, and real estate services, as well as specialized entity accounting, administration, and formation for corporate clients and their advisors.

The company was founded in 1899 and is headquartered in Wilmington, Delaware with additional offices in London, the United Kingdom; and the United States.

acquisitions.source_description: Corporation Service Company(R) Acquires Business Credit Services, Inc.
